(2,): As a database administrator, I want to process deletions from 12-19-2017, so that the database remains clean and up-to-date As a UI designer, I want to update the Resources page design, so that it matches Broker styles consistently As a system administrator, I want to configure New Relic for all applications, so that we can monitor application performance effectively As a web administrator, I want to update frontend URLs, so that users access the correct resources As a UI manager, I want to update the sample file link in the UI, so that users can access the correct sample files
